bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Writing feng wan 風頑. Alternative Names jiu feng 久風 , long-lasting wind; lao feng 老風 , old wind. Pathological Condition of stubborn, difficult-to-cure wind diseases. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry qin gui 秦龜：治 婦人赤白漏下，破積癥，頑風冷痹，關節氣壅。或經卜者更妙 , “They curered and white leaking discharge of women, break open accumulations and concretion-illness, stubborn wind and cold blockage, as well as qi obstruction in the joints. Those that were used for divination are particularly effective”.
